channel.title: 100 errors?

item.title: 100 errors?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Replace the code you showed me with this:

         case 158:
            talk3("Welcome to Team Deadly Ninjas", "Please wait until the game starts..", "Good luck!", 3781);
            break;
         case 160:
            talk3("Welcome to Team Killer Crushers", "Please wait until the game starts..", "Good luck!", 3781);
            break;
            
         case 162:
            talk("Good luck", 3781);
            break;
            
         case 164:
            talk("Good luck", 3781);
            break;

   
	public void resetOtherAtk() {
		for(int i = 1; i < KilledBy.length; i++) {
			KilledBy = 0;
	} 	
}

If that doesn’t work, try this:

         case 158:
            talk3("Welcome to Team Deadly Ninjas", "Please wait until the game starts..", "Good luck!", 3781);
            break;
         case 160:
            talk3("Welcome to Team Killer Crushers", "Please wait until the game starts..", "Good luck!", 3781);
            break;
            
         case 162:
            talk("Good luck", 3781);
            break;
            
         case 164:
            talk("Good luck", 3781);
            break;
	}

   
	public void resetOtherAtk() {
		for(int i = 1; i < KilledBy.length; i++) {
			KilledBy = 0;
	} 	
}
